name: Golden Feng-Tail Crown (Wukong's Fake Armor)
description: Unmissable, story-related. Automatically earned in Chapter 6.

name: Bull King's Mask
description: Can be crafted after defeating Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast at the end of Chapter 5 Secret Area. Requires Bull King's Iron Horns dropped by this boss (must beat it again in NG+ to craft full set). Another horn is found in chest in Chapter 5 Secret Area so be sure to grab this too. In order to craft the full set you will need New Game+ to get enough materials.

name: Golden Mask of Fury
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 4.

name: Pilgrim's Headband
description: Can be crafted upon reaching the "Guanyin Temple Shrine" in Chapter 1.

name: Folk Opera Mask
description: Exclusive to the Deluxe Edition of the game. If owned, it can be crafted at the first Shrine of the game. Not necessary for the trophy.

name: Yaksha Mask of Outrage
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 6.

name: Iron Horned Helm
description: Can be crafted after challenging and defeating the Yin Tiger blacksmith in Zodiac Village. Must have done Chen Loong questline to reach Zodiac Village.

name: Centipede Hat of Transcendence
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 5.

name: Non-Pure Broken Mask
description: Can be crafted after defeating Zhu Bajie boss in Chapter 4.

name: Monastic Insect Hat
description: Can be crafted after defeating Fuban boss in Chapter 2 Secret Area.

name: Earth Spirit Cap
description: Chapter 5 > Filed of Fire > Ashen Pass III: from the Shrine, go behind it and gather the big mushroom in the middle. Defeat the Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai boss for this guaranteed drop.

name: Skull of Turtle Treasure
description: Chapter 5 > Woods of Ember > Height of Ember: from the Shrine, continue on past the gate and down the hill where you'll eventually will find this big mouse-masked enemy. You must farm this enemy for this rare drop.

name: Locust Antennae Mask
description: Chapter 4 > Webbed Hollow > Upper Hollow: from the Shrine, go up the stairs and then continue left to find a locust enemy spawning from a cocoon. You must farm this enemy for this rare drop.

name: See No Evil
description: Chapter 3 > New Thunderclap Temple > Temple Entrance: from the Shrine, go down the stairs and enter the first building. Here you must farm the Blind Monk enemies for this rare drop. There are several other monks in the area that you can all kill for a chance to get this.

name: Galeguard Beast Mask
description: Can be crafted after defeating the Stone Vanguard boss in Chapter 2.

name: Bronze Monkey Mask
description: Can be crafted after defeating Elder Jinchi boss in Chapter 1 Secret area.

name: Snout Mask
description: Dropped by the "Yellow-Robed Squire" boss you fight as part of the Drunken Boar questline in Chapter 2.

name: Grey Wolf Mask
description: Earned for defeating Lingxuzi boss in Chapter 1.

name: Golden Feng-Tail Crown (Wukong's True Armor)
description: Chapter 6 > Foothills > Verdant Path. From the Shrine, turn left 90Â° and you'll see a mountain at the end of the path. Fly on the cloud, land on this mountain to find a small golden chest that contains this secret armor set.

name: Lion Head of Opulence
description: Claimable from the Keeper's Shrine after updating to version 1.0.13.16669.
